mapper.insert: insert into gh_board(board_type_id, title, content, writer) values(#{boardTypeId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer.no})
mapper.select:
select b.board_id, b.title, b.writer, b.created_date, b.view_cnt, m.nickname from gh_board b inner join gh_member m on b.writer = m.member_id
where b.title like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or b.content like(concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
order by b.board_id desc

select b.board_id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, (select name from gh_member where member_id = b.writer) name, b.created_date, b.view_cnt, bf.boardfile_id, bf.filepath, bf.origin_filename, bf.mime_type from gh_board b left outer join gh_boardfile bf on b.board_id = bf.board_id where b.board_id=#{no}
